text: Hans Aniol was a German swimmer. He competed in the men's underwater swimming event and the water polo at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:German male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Germany Category:Olympic water polo players of Germany Category:Swimmers at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Hans Aniol
